events.message: I recently received my order but want to return it because the product is not as described and I would like a refund.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to customer's request for money back and return.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund, and Iâ€™m here to help you with that process.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know the reason for the refund request in more detail?
My order number is 123456789. The product arrived damaged and is missing parts, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund once you return the item. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the product back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was successfully completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
